title: Navegg
shortDescription: Solutions in Big Data, DMP and Web Analytics.
longDescription:
# About Navegg

We are passionate about people and technology. We love studying human behavior to discover patterns and anticipate trends. And what excites us most about all this is that by sharing our creations, we make digital life smarter.

This has been our philosophy since 2008 when we created the digital marketing as a reflection of the interests and desires of the internet. With pioneering spirit and enthusiasm, we set up a talented team to become leaders in data intelligence in Emerging Markets.

Navegg is a technology company that operates in partnership with major publishers and agencies to approach brands and people in the digital environment.

# Navegg Analytics

Navegg Analytics is a Navegg solution for businesses that want to really know their audience.

## For blogs and small businesses

If you have a blog or a small/average business, pick the basic module. With him, you can analyze classic data like visits by genre, age, and more. Qualitative information is included. All these information will help you build a complete media kit or take more assertive actions.

## For e-commerces

If your focus is laid on conversion sales, besides accessing qualitative information about your audience you can build a personalized conversion funnel for your business, receive the visitors with exclusive offers and analyze that information to make strategic decisions.

## For advertisers

Doesn’t your website sell any product but buys media online? Your focus is not on sales but branding? Implement an analysis of attribution to discover which campaigns and channels work better for your company.
author: Navegg Team

categories.title: Insights
categories.description: Apps that provide insight into your visitors.

proposedApp.title: Navegg
proposedApp.shortDescription: Solutions in Big Data, DMP and Web Analytics.
proposedApp.longDescription:
Navegg is Latin America's reference in the data intelligence market and online audience data. Founded in 2008, the company, based in Brazil, analyzes navigation habits, interests and web audience behavior on desktops or mobile devices. Navegg has a database of over 400 million Internet users, in more than 100,000 websites, blogs, price search engines and e-commerce.
Navegg's proprietary technology classifies the Internet User based on the browsing behavior. Currently, eight out of ten of the leading publishers in Latin America use Navegg's solutions for content personalization and campaign targeting, as well as large agencies and advertisers, e-commerce and blogs.
proposedApp.author: Navegg Team

proposedApp.shortDescription: Integração com a tecnologia Navegg via tag Java Script

proposedApp.title: Navegg
proposedApp.shortDescription: Solutions in Big Data, DMP and Web Analytics.
proposedApp.longDescription:
## What does Navegg do?

Navegg is Emerging Markets’ leader in the online audience data market with over **400 million online users** segmented according to their interests, purchase intention, online behavior and social-demographics information. Navegg infers the online users profile according to their online behavior and categorizes them based on gender, age range, interests, among others.

Navegg’s core lies in understanding the internet user. They are classified in over 1,400 segments. To structure the information in a way to facilitate your understanding, Navegg has different taxonomies: Demographic and Interests, Navegg EveryOne and Navegg EveryBuyer.

## How does Navegg find out the online audience profile?

Navegg collects navigation data on every website that has its technology implemented. The anonymous data is analyzed and compared to other online users’ online behavior. These people are clustered according to mathematical and statistics’ methods which are based on market studies and research about consumer behavior and trends.

## What is the difference between Navegg and Google Analytics?

Whereas Google Analytics brings precisely and quantifiable data (conversion rate, bounce rate, pageviews, how many people have come to determined websites, etc), Navegg brings some of these informations but the focus are the audience’s behavior trace as profile, purchase intention, preferences, etc. Learn more about all the information supplied by Navegg here.

# Is Navegg Analytics for my business?

Navegg Analytics is a Navegg solution for businesses that want to know not just how many people has accessed your site but who they are.

## Blogs and small business

If you have a blog or a small/average business, pick the basic module. With him, you can analyse classic data like visits by genre, age, and more. Qualitative information is included. All these information will help you build a complete media kit or take more assertive actions.

## E-commerce

If your focus is laid on conversion sales, besides accessing qualitative information about your audience you can build a personalized conversion funnel for your business, receive the visitors with exclusive offers and analyze that information to make strategic decisions.

## Advertisers

Doesn’t your website sell any product but buys media online? Your focus is not in sales but branding? Implement an analysis of attribution to discover which campaigns and channels work better for your company.
proposedApp.author: Navegg Team
